name: WhiteNoises
0:
”Alexa open white noises”
”Alexa ask white noises to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: white noises
des: Block out all your distractions and fall asleep with ease! White noises are the best research-supported aid for achieving deep relaxation, sharpening focus, and promoting restful sleep. Get started by saying, 'Alexa, open White Noises,' and enjoy a 30-minute session of sound. It's an excellent feature to use during sleep, for deep relaxation, meditation practices, or to help concentrate on your tasks.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
